metadata.name: Vice City
metadata.description:
" Exploring through the downtown of Vice City in its prime "

Details :
2160 by 2700 Dimensions
10 Second Infinite Loop

ATOMA is a collection of sceneries which portray a sense of belonging to those who can live and breathe an environment through the power of visuals.
This collection is primarily Ryanole's exploration of the subtle yet captivating field of Line Art. The premise is to push the boundaries of art by incorporating personal touch to the art genre.
